heading: All of our Upcoming Services and Events are found on our [A Church near You Portal](https://www.achurchnearyou.com/church/11690/service-and-events/events-regular/).

list.title: Sunday Worship
list.time: Every Sunday at 10:30 am for 30 minutes
list.content: Our usual Sunday Morning service has been replaced for the meantime with a Sunday 'Livestream' that is a Live or as-live broadcast on our church Facebook Site.
